title: Augmented Reality-Based Acquisition of Technical Vocational Skills for Students with Hearing Impairments [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Mathematics Concepts and Basic Understanding of TVET (Technical and Vocational Education and Training)
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based AR simulation in limited-technology environments, enhanced motivation through gamification elements, with instructional design tailored to deaf students' visual learning characteristics and skill acquisition needs

learning_goals: Perform math-based technical vocational tasks (measurement, calculations, etc.) with over 85% accuracy using AR-based simulations
Achieve a 40% improvement in practical skill proficiency within 12 weeks through gamification elements (challenges, reward systems)
Enable hearing-impaired students to independently understand complex technical procedures with over 90% accuracy using visual learning support tools (3D modeling, real-time feedback)

resources: Low-Spec VR Headset or Cardboard VR
Haptic Feedback Device for Hearing-Impaired Students
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
